full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MYUR MDZAD YE SHES MGON DKAR YID BZHIN NOR BU SGRUB TSUL 'DOD PA'I RE SKONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CES MI TOG 'THOR RTEN 'BRIS SNYING PO'I GZUNGS LAN GSUM 'AM BDUN BZLAS, GA-YANG 'GUGS BYED NA DAR SNA TSOGS KYIS 'GREL PAS 'BRI SOGS KYIS 'GREL NANG DU 'JUG ,BKRA SHIS RGYAS PAR BRJOD, GSUM MJUG GI BYA BA ZHIB MOR BYA'O, ,^ GTER DU SPA BA'I GNAS NI RGYAL PO PHO BRANG DANG DGE 'DUN 'DUS PA'I SDER GNAS DANG KHYIM BDAG GI KHYIM KHANG SOGS GANG LA YANG RUNG, ,CES NOR BU'I SGRUB THABS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI SKUL 'BUM RGYUD PA SKU GSUM SHES PA'I SPRUL SKU SEMS CAN LA PHAN SEMS KYIS BSKUL STE SBYAR BA'O, ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BKRA SHIS 'BAR 'GYUR CIG , ,,)
